content: Loved the article and could really see myself in this. How as a challenger when you understand that your vision is not embraced in your organization, you feel the need to step aside and find other ways to fulfill it. What I discovered is that we run into this challenge of getting other people to join us towards change in all fields of our lives, not only in our work and I at least, have really struggled to learn how to value and take into consideration other people’s points of view and what makes them not align with my vision. Once I learnt how to incorporate this in my actions towards implementing change, things have become a lot easier :).
